Text: Companies in advanced economies are already automating some customer support services rather than offshoring them. This could reduce the $160 billion global market for business process outsourcing (BPO), now one of the most heavily traded service sectors.
Cause: Companies in advanced economies are already automating some customer support services rather than offshoring them.
Effect: This could reduce the $160 billion global market for business process outsourcing (BPO), now one of the most heavily traded service sectors.
Sentence: <e1>Companies in advanced economies are already automating some customer support services rather than offshoring them.</e1> <e2>This could reduce the $160 billion global market for business process outsourcing (BPO), now one of the most heavily traded service sectors.</e2>
